amendment.description: Amendment to require the Chief of the U.S. Forest Service to publish a notice in the Federal Register, with a justification, for the closure of any public road on Forest System lands.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 10 printed in House Report 114-429 to require the Chief of the U.S. Forest Service to publish a notice in the Federal Register, with a justification, for the closure of any public road on Forest System lands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Newhouse.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
